title: PM reviews progress of under-construction flats in G-13
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 11 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday paid a surprise visit to the under-construction apartments of Naya Pakistan Housing Programme in the capitalâ€™s G-13 sector.
The prime minister reviewed the progress of the ongoing project and directed its early completion.
The Naya Pakistan housing programme is aimed at providing affordable residence to people.
